definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: But it's hard to imitate the painting of Tong Pak Fu!
sentences.chinese: 可是唐伯虎的畫意境那麼高，我又怎麼能模仿得來呢？

sentences.english: Artistic conception" was the essence of Li KeRan's artistic viewpoints."
sentences.chinese: “意境”是李可染的藝術觀中最核心的概念。

sentences.english: She opened the first page and I heard poetry for the first time in my life.
sentences.chinese: 她翻到第一頁，於是我平生第一次聽到了詩的意境。

sentences.english: The mood is set for a journey towards inner calm and outer beauty.
sentences.chinese: 這形成了一種內心的平靜和外表的美麗相融合的意境。

sentences.english: Last but not least, it is impractical to modernize and globalize the theory of artistic conception.
sentences.chinese: 意境理認的“現代化”與“世界化”難以實現。

sentences.english: At this time, reminds me of "Xiao-he was exposed sharp corner" in mood.
sentences.chinese: 這時，讓我想起了“小荷才露尖尖角”的意境。

sentences.english: This hands over to the artistic conception canvas of the brightness and is collected lightly and shadly by a Swiss friend individual.
sentences.chinese: 這副明暗交輝的意境油畫被一位瑞士友人私人珍藏。

sentences.english: I prefer to the older movie because that it is more accordant with the artistic conception of the article.
sentences.chinese: 我更喜歡老的那部電影，感覺上更符合文章的意境。

sentences.english: Yijing (artistic mood) is an important concept in the Chinese aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 意境是中國美學的重要概念。

sentences.english: Xinyue poets paid special attention to create the aesthetic poems.
sentences.chinese: 新月派詩人特別注重詩的美的意境創造。

sentences.english: The structure of mood of time and space of Japanese Chinese poetry shows its impact from the Tang poetry in four ways.
sentences.chinese: 日本漢詩的時空意境構成受唐詩影響有四種表現。

sentences.english: Bright apricot yellow would have created a mood of unrestrained youth.
sentences.chinese: 明快的杏黃色又會創造出青春的奔放意境。

sentences.english: Suddenly a surprising image or epigram will light up the scene.
sentences.chinese: 一個突如其來的形象或警句突然把意境照亮。

sentences.english: Secondly, the artistic conception of "Litchi Honey" seems to be pieced together stiffly.
sentences.chinese: 其次，《荔枝蜜》的意境有生硬拼湊之嫌。

sentences.english: The Chinese poems are short but the meaning is deep.
sentences.chinese: 中國詩歌短小精悍卻意境幽遠。

sentences.english: An indifferent to the moon in the flowers were gradually rising, more moods.
sentences.chinese: 一輪明月淡然的在花叢中冉冉升起，更顯意境。

definition: implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
interest/point of particular charm and interest
to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
charm or grace (in poetry or art)
oneness of heaven and humanity/the theory that man is an integral part of nature
